attributes.additional_details: Many Britions believe the security risk, and should be banned in public view.  Sign if you feel the burka should be banned in public for a good cause!
attributes.background: Many of us would like the UK government to ban the burka in public. When a person is wearing a burka, their identity is hidden, meaning they can use the burka to commit crimes, hiding their face. Who is beyond the burka? Muslim? Terrorist? Criminal? We don't know!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104649

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
